item.title: San Francisco resources
item.description: See also: SF LGBT Center Resources directory Trauma-informed spiritual groups SF Dharma Collective SF Zen Center GLIDE radically inclusive church (there are many more) Immersion Learning & Retreat Centers 1440 Multiversity - Santa Cruz Esalen Institute — Big Sur holistic alternative retreat center Spirit Rock — Marin Insight meditation center Green Gulch Farm — Marin Deer Park Monastery — Escondido, CA — Thich Nhat Hanh’s monestary in the US HIV/AIDS Support SF AIDS Foundation
